item.description:
Sat 10:00 AM - 1:00 PM FDIY Corporate, 1 Industrial Dr., Windham, NH

My tax guy says that EVERYONE should own a home based business...here's why - http://wp.me/pNfNP-2A

Sat. 6/16/2012, 10 am, FDIY Training Center, 1 Industrial Dr, Windham, NH - 90 for Life - 90 Essential nutrients and minerals and ASAP!

Do you want to be as slim as possible, as soon as possible?

Who doesn't, right?  Anyone who has ever struggled with weight loss, for sure!  I know that's my goal.  I just got through my first round of ASAP and I lost 18 lbs in 3 weeks.  When I tell people that, they are floored!  My friend Jenn has been on it 4 weeks and she lost 24 lbs.  So, it works...but, how?

What is ASAP As Slim As Possible?

ASAP is a program that supports your body's function to burn the Abnormal (adipose) fat Stores.

 You know what that is girls?  Yeaup, that's your gut that no matter what you do, won't go away!
Oh yeah, it's that flabby stuff that's under your arms.  Where the heck did that come from, anyway?

To learn more about ASAP, visit www.asapyoungevity.com!  To get some, visit www.my90forlife.com/fdirocks , click on join now and become a preferred customer to save 30%!

Hey, I've done everything, if it can work for me, it can work for anyone!

To our mutual success!
Bernadette Trafton, VPMD/ITD
dette101@gmail.com
603-834-4587
